fullName.jp: レナ・シャルロット・タイクーン

description.jp: タイクーン王国の心優しき王女。隕石の落下で気絶していたところをバッツらに助けられ 共にクリスタルを守る旅に出ることに。行方不明の姉との再会など様々な出会いと別れに翻弄されながらも国や民 そして世界を救うという信念の元 奮闘した。
description.gl: The kind-hearted princess of Tycoon. Bartz rescues Lenna, who had lost consciousness from a meteorite impact, and together they journey to protect the crystals. Finding her long-lost sister, and experiencing many other meetings and partings, through thick and thin, her conviction to her kingdom, her subjects, and to saving the world drives her on.

jp.text: こっちを見ちゃだめよ！
やっぱり姉さんだったのね！
怖がっているのね……大丈夫よ こっちにおいで！
私たちがいるじゃない！
涙なんか 似合わないわよ？

gl.text: I knew it! You really ARE my sister!
Oh、 you must have been so scared... It's okay now、 don't worry. Come closer!

desc.gl:
Adds effect to Princess of Tycoon that slightly raises party's limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV

At start of quest:
 • 8 turns MAX BRV Up II, ATK Up II, Princess of Tycoon
 • First turn does not consume use count (some abilities excluded)
 • First turn rate becomes instantaneous
 • First turn does not add to turn count; does consume turn during summoning, support
 
When using Brave Phoenix:
 • Princess of Tycoon duration +4

「プリンセスオブタイクーン」に
味方全員の奪ったBRVを
最大BRVを超えて加算する上限小アップの効果追加

desc.gl:
When using Brave Phoenix:
 • Increased BRV may exceed individual MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Tremendous BRV damage boost
 • Tremendously increased limit for stolen BRV that may exceed MAX BRV

While Princess of Tycoon active:
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; grants party BRV based on HP damage dealt)
